column5: 4 Hours on indirect heat.Some home made sauce that goes way back.Way back before my time. I am so lucky,it was passed on.   Pic says it all. Well not realy.
thanks   I just barfed up what I ate    and ordered in some ribs   you are mean

I'll bet it tasted even better after winning our NASCAR pool this week, huh Bud? Ironically I finished second because I picked Jr.    The good news for me was that I had Smoke in my local pool which paid me $350.00  Enjoy your ribs my friend.

It,s all about the sauce my friend. I got one right this time.  Good on ya for winning some cash Dan. I dont bet real cash. Im poor.LOL  Jr is doing better then most thought.Bad luck about the blown tire. Even you cant argue that.
I'm in Barrie as well and I think I caught a whiff of those earlier!  YUMMY!  Tacos just ain't cutting it tonight!! lol
You going to have some of that at work this week with Brian..........lol..lol
